      • Glyph

        public Glyph(int font,
     int character,
     int offset,
     int baseline,
     int width,
     int height,
     byte[] fontdata)
        Construct a Glyph object
        Parameters:
        font - Font ID for Glyph
        character - Character ID for Glyph
        offset - x-offset of Glyph data for drawing
        baseline - y-offset of Glyph data for drawing
        width - Width of Glyph, in pixels
        height - Height of Glyph, in pixels
        fontdata - Data detailing Glyph's graphical representation
